screenshot.caption: QPW file open in Corel Quattro Pro 2021

description: Quattro Pro is used by casual and professional users to create spreadsheets for various purposes, including invoices, personal budgets, sales receipts, and business expenses. The application can save spreadsheets in a variety of formats, including the QPW file type, which is the primary file type associated with the application.

You can choose the format you want to save the spreadsheet in by selecting File â†’ Save As... , then select the "File type" dropdown menu. Some formats besides QPW include Excel .XLSX or .XLS , .CSV , and Lotus 1-2-3 .123 files.

common_filenames.description: Notebk1.qpw - The default name given to a new QPW file by Quattro Pro.
